metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）四年级上册_2b5ed97d
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）四年级上册_2b5ed97d.pdf

content: 同学们，欢迎你们来到英语学习课堂！ 通过一年的学习，同学们已经对英语有了初步的认识，学会了用一些简单的句子同身边的人打招呼、问好，学会了表达身边常见的物品，学会了按照规范书写字母和单词，在有趣的听做、 说唱、玩演、读写等活动中，渐渐培养了对英语的兴趣。你们一定还希望学到更多的英语知识，那就赶快打开课本吧！ 在本册课本中，同学们将继续在Peter，Lingling，Mingming， Anne，Dongdong，当然，还有Tim和可爱的Dino的陪伴下，学习更多用英语表达形状、动物、食品、服装、方位、100以内的数字、 体育运动等的方法，并运用这些表达方法，在老师的指导下做游戏、与同学进行简单的交流，表达喜欢或不喜欢某种事物的情感。 本册课本中有一个新的板块，同学们将在此开始学习在图片的帮助下轻松地听懂、读懂简短的小故事，然后根据提示“照抄”出简单的词语。记住：没有全部读懂也没有关系，那些提示会帮助你们写出词语的。虽然好像是“照抄”，但不同于机械的书写，而是在理解的基础上的“抄写”。这是个小小的挑战哦！ 希望同学们喜欢这些小故事，顺利地完成读写任务。 随着同学们步入新的学年，课本中的语言知识会一点点加深。同学们千万不要害怕，不要紧张。按照老师的指导，坚持不懈，就一定能够学好英语。让我们一起努力吧！ 你们的大朋友：小学《英语》教材编写组

5 Unit It’s a circle. Let’s Listen and Say What’s that, Lingling? It’s a circle. What’s this? It’s a square. One, two, three, four, five, six, seven! How many circles are there? It’s a boy. It’s you! 1 2 3 4 Me? 
6 Let’s Learn Let’s Act circle square line dot What’s that? It’s a square. 
7 Let’s Read Let’s Read and Write What are you doing, Dino? What’s that? Let’s write. 1. There are seven . 2. There is one . 3. There are five . 4. There are four . I’m drawing. It’s a Dino Land flag! 1 2 3 4 circles

9 Let’s Listen and Say Look at this elephant. Unit Look at this elephant. It’s big. Look at that tiger. It’s strong. Look at that monkey. It’s funny. Look at this bird. It’s beautiful. 1 2 3 4 
10 Let’s Learn Let’s Act a strong tiger a beautiful bird a big elephant a funny monkey a small mouse I’m a mouse. I’m small. I’m an elephant. I’m big. 
11 Let’s Read Let’s Read and Write No, it isn’t. It’s a cat. Let’s write. 1. Jack has a little . 2. There are many in the zoo. 3. Jack says “No” to the . It’s a tiger. Yes, it’s lazy Catty! Is that right? 1 2 3 What’s this? Jack has a little zoo. There are many animals in the zoo. There is a funny monkey. There is a small elephant. There is a strong tiger. “May I come in?” a big mouse asks. “No! It’s not good for you!” Jack says.

A . 7 B . 15 C . 20 2 . The cows are . A . cute B . strong C . funny 3 . Ben is a . A . dog B . cow C . duck Mr Mark has a big farm. There are seven cows and twenty ducks on his farm. Look at the cows. They are strong. Look at the ducks. They are small and cute. What’s that beside Mr Mark? It’s Ben. He is Mr Mark’s dog. Mr Mark loves his animals.

19 Let’s Read Let’s Read and Write They’re eggs. What’s in it? Don’t touch it! Let’s w rite. 1. Animals in Jack’s zoo are . 2. Jack says, “ . ” 3. The mouse cries, “ . ” What are these? I’m sorry, Tim. 1 2 3 Oh no! It’s broken. There are other animals in Jack’s zoo. Look! Look at the beautiful birds. Look at the lovely rabbits. “May I look at them?” asks the big mouse. “No. You’re a bad mouse,” Jack says. “No! No! No! I’m a good mouse!” the mouse cries.

Let’s Read Let’s Read and Write 23 I don’t like rice. I like biscuits. Can I have some? Sing and dance, Dino. Very good. Dino, you can have my biscuits. 1 2 3 4 But I’m hungry! Let’s write. 1. Birds like . 2. Mary’s cat likes . 3. Mary’s cat doesn’t like . Birds like rice. Cats like milk. But my cat doesn’t like milk. He likes fish. He eats too much. I say to my cat, “Don’t eat too much.” He says, “But I’m hungry!” 24 Let’s Chant Let’s Have Fun What’s the children’s favourite food? Draw the lines to find out. The s un shines on the s and. 25 Unit Turn right ! Let’s Listen and Say Let’s play a guessing game. Left, right. Left, right. You are traffic policemen. 1 2 3 4 5 6 Are you soldiers? Yes, we are. What are we? Turn right! What are we? 
26 Let’s Learn Let’s Act left right Turn left! Turn right! Turn left! turn up down 
27 Let’s Read Let’s Read and Write Let’s write. 1. W hite turns and runs fast, and then turns . 2. Black turns and runs fast, and then turns . 1 2 3 4 5 Tim teaches Dino a new dance. Right. This is right. Left. This is left. Left and right. Turn left, Dino. Tom has two dogs. One is White and the other is Black. Tom says, “One, two, three, run!” White turns left and runs fast. Black turns right and runs fast, too. Then White turns right and Black turns left. Where are they now?

I have milk and cornflakes for breakfast. I have some orange juice, too. I have dumplings for breakfast. I have some bean milk, too.

30 Assessment II 1 . 2 . 3 . 4 . Listen and number. Listen and tick . 
31 Read and match. Read and write. Tom has a cat. Her name is Kitty. She is two years old. She likes fish and milk. Amy has a dog. His name is Rocky. He is eight. He likes meat. Tim has a dinosaur. His name is Dino. Dino is six. He likes dumplings. 1 . Kitty likes . 2 . Rocky likes . 3 . Dino likes . 1 . 2 . 3 . 4 . 5 . Turn right. Those sheep like grass. Sam likes bread. Turn left. These are eggs. 
32 Draw a if you can do it. Draw a if you can’t. I can do it! 1 . Point out the things around. 2 . Tell your friends what food you like. Those are beautiful birds. I like to do it! Draw a if you like to do it. Draw a if you don’t. 1 . Turn left/right. 2 . Chant and act out the rhymes you like. I like dumplings. Turn left!

33 Unit Whose is this? Let’s Listen and Say Is this your wallet, Lingling? Is this your wallet, Jane? Oh, yes! It’s my wallet. Thank you very much, Miss Li. 1 2 3 4 No, it isn’t. Whose is this? Here you are. 
34 Let’s Learn Let’s Act bag scarf key wallet hat mobile phone 1 2 3 4 Put your things in this box. Whose is this, Linda? It’s Benny’s wallet. Thank you. Whose is this, Helen? 
35 Let’s Read Let’s Read and Write Kate likes pets. She has two dogs and two cats. Their names are Harry, Dick, Spot and Jerry. They like strange clothes. They wear strange clothes. Oh, they look very funny. Let’s write. Whose clothes are they? Spot Jerry Harry 1 2 3 Jerry’s coat What’s this? It’s a dress, Dino. No, Dino! It’s Anne’s dress! I like Anne’s dress. Dick

37 Unit She wears a white and black sweater. Let’s Listen and Say Look at the dancer. She wears a white and black sweater. Oh, she’s Miss Panda. What’s her name? 1 2 3 4 She wears black trousers and shoes. Miss Black? Miss White? 
38 Let’s Learn Let’s Act white and black brown and grey shoes socks sweater skirt She wears a brown and yellow sweater. He wears a white and grey sweater. 
39 Let’s Read Let’s Read and Write I’m cold. Where’s my yellow and blue scarf? OK. Here’s a red and green scarf for you. Wow, it’s warm. Thank you, Tim! I’m cold, too. 1 3 2 Lily has three good friends, Amy, Jane and Nancy. Amy wears a red and white dress. She likes red and white. Jane wears a blue and white sweater. She likes blue. Nancy wears a green and white skirt. She likes green. Let’s write. What are their names?

content: 47 Look, read and circle. Read and write (T) or (F). 1 . The scarf is blue and white. It’s long. 2 . He is my brother. He wears a brown and yellow sweater. 3 . The girl likes white and green. She wears a green skirt and white shoes. A . B . C . 1 . The jacket is 45 yuan . ( ) 2 . The shirt is 35 yuan . ( ) 3 . It isn’t the boy’s shop. ( ) 4 . It’s the boy’s grandma’s clothes shop. ( ) 5 . The hat and the skirt are eighty yuan . ( ) A . B . C . A . B . C . Boy: Hello. Can I help you? Woman: Yes. How much is the red hat? Boy: It’s forty yuan . Woman: How much is the yellow skirt? Boy: It’s thirty-five yuan . Woman: I’d like the hat and the skirt. How much are they? Boy: Er, I don’t know. Woman: Is this your clothes shop? Boy: No! Woman: Whose is it? Boy: It’s my grandma’s.

metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）四年级上册_2b5ed97d.pdf

content: 65 Let’s Read More Stories Stories from from Around Around the the World World Fendi is a little fish. He lives in a big, blue sea. One day, Fendi swims a long way from his home. He gets lost . He can’t find his father and mother. That afternoon, a little girl catches Fendi. She puts him in her fish tank . Fendi is very sad. One day, a big bird flies to the window. Fendi jumps into the big bird’s mouth. The bird flies to the big, blue sea. Fendi jumps out of his mouth and into the water. He says, “Thank you very much!” Fendi is happy to see his mother and father. He swims away with them. They are a happy family again. Big Bird and Little Fish Activity A big bird comes to take Fendi home. I can take you home. Really? fish tank Number the pictures. Guess, Check and Learn get lost fish tank

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）四年级上册_2b5ed97d
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）四年级上册_2b5ed97d.pdf

content: 66 Let’s Read More Stories Stories from from Around Around the the World World This is a story about King Arthur of England. Arthur is a very smart boy. He’s eleven. One day, Arthur sees a sword in a stone . Arthur thinks, “How can a beautiful sword get into a big stone?” He pulls and it comes right out. But, Arthur doesn’t take the sword home. It isn’t his. So, he puts it back into the stone. Then, a wise old man comes to the town. His name is Merlin. He asks everyone to try to pull the sword out of the stone. No one can do it. Arthur says, “I can.” Arthur pulls it out. Merlin reads the words on the sword, “Pull me out and you will be the king.” That is how Arthur becomes the new king. The Sword in the Stone Activity king smart sword stone pull wise Guess, Check and Learn You find something. It is not yours. What do you do? Keep it. Don’t tell anyone. Take it home. Don’t take it. Circle your answer. I can pull it out. stone sword Arthur
